runs.comm: short of a length around off stump, bounces a bit more, Guptill gets on his toes and plays it down
short of a length with width outside off, cuts but can't beat point
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot through cover, it's the long boundary and the running is so quick that they complete a third run
jumps back and across and dabs a good length ball through square leg
backs away towards leg and hacks at a length ball, hitting it hard into the ground and to the fielder at cover
too short and a bit too straight, that's the length and line you cannot bowl because the side boundary is so short, Guptill goes back and pulls the ball over deep midwicket into the grass banks
good length and straight, Williamson stays in his crease and plays to point
short of a length on the pads, Williamson moves towards the off to get inside the line and whips the ball to the backward square leg boundary
good length on the pads again, Amir staying away from the off side because that's where the short boundary is, Williamson tries to glance but does not make proper contact
good length on middle and off, zipping across the right-hander from over the wicket, Guptill stays back, squares up his stance a little and defends towards point
good length on the pads, Guptill moves across in his crease and nudges through square leg
short of a length on the hips, Williamson goes back and works the ball along the ground behind square leg
bowled full and outside off, quite quick too, Williamson goes back and cuts in the air but just fine of the diving fielder at short third man

flat, fast and wide outside off, Williamson uses the width and cuts late, piercing the gap between the fielders at backward point and short third man. Wasim is clearly trying to stay away from the short leg side boundary
good length and straight, nudged off the back foot on the leg side
bowled flat and quick outside off, Guptill cuts off the back foot to point
driven to long off for a single
bowled flat, short and wide outside off, Williamson steps out and then reaches for the ball and slaps it through cover for four more. The ground dimensions are messing with Wasim's plans
and Guptill goes inside out, lofting the ball over wide mid-off, hitting it with the spin for a one-bounce four, he hit that off his pads nearly
defended into the off side
blocked off the front foot back to the bowler
bowled flat and straight, defended into the off side, a bit of a mix-up there Dave not no damage done
bowled on a good length on middle and leg, Afridi is getting some drift, defended back to the bowler
worked off the back foot in front of square leg for a single, strong comeback from Afridi
Guptill goes inside out again, moving forward and towards leg to loft the slower ball over wide mid-on, lots of space in the deep on the long boundary so the ball falls safely and rolls into the rope
a full ball on the pads, Guptill can't beat short fine leg work the glance, 143 kph
good length angling across the right-hander, Williamson moves in his crease towards the off side and dabs to short third man
a full ball on the pads, Williamson moves across to flicks but misses, the ball goes off his pad and flies wide of the keeper for leg byes, that pitched outside leg so Amir won't get his lbw
shot! Williamson moves across his crease to a length ball outside off and paddles it over the head of the man at short fine leg
shot again! Moves across to a fuller ball and drills it through the gap at midwicket to the short boundary. Pakistan were 30 after five overs, New Zealand are 53.
goes back into his crease and dabs the ball off his pads towards square leg
bowled on a good length with drift into the right-hander, defended on the front foot to the bowler
steps out and works the legbreak spinning away from him towards mid on
presses forward and defends a flat ball to the bowler
shot! Gets down on one knee and nails the slog sweep, hitting it flat and into the gap on the deep backward square leg boundary
pushes forward at a leg break and is beaten by the turn away from him
a full ball angling across the right-hander, driven on the front foot to deep cover, so smooth is Williamson
good length on a wicket to wicket line, Guptill drops the ball with soft hands close on the off side, Williamson responds quickly to his call and runs the single
good length angling across the right-hander, came back at him a touch, Williamson tries to steer to third man but edges on to the pad
short of a length outside off, Williamson pulls and the fielder at midwicket dives and takes some pace off the ball, it is the short boundary behind him
clears his front foot and hits the ball back at the bowler, he mis-timed that, Wahab bends down on his follow through to field
short of a length ball outside off, Guptill has width to free his arms and he just biffs it off the back foot to the long on boundary
bowled flat on middle and leg, turned off the pads through square leg, long boundary there so plenty of space to come back for the second
worked off the back foot through midwicket gently for a single
played back towards the bowler on the back foot
bowled flat on a good length on middle, Guptill goes back and hits the ball to midwicket
worked off the pads through midwicket again for a single
swept to deep square leg for a single
clears his front foot and mows the length ball to deep square leg, Malik fields it on the bounce
moves back and towards the off side and steers the ball going across him to third man
defended off the back foot towards point
clears his front foot to slog on the leg side but mis-times the ball towards mid off, Guptill was trying to target the short leg-side boundary
shot! Williamson jumps back and a little towards leg to punch a good length ball through the covers, he is so well balanced as he makes contact
stays back and flicks the ball through midwicket where Hafeez dives over the ball
defended from the crease into the off side, Wasim moves across and fields
a fuller length on the pads, driven through midwicket for two more
flatter and shorter outside off, Williamson mis-times the ball off the front foot, not often that happens
goes back to hit the ball hard but can't find the gap at point
the good length ball straightens on Guptill, he closes the face and gets a leading edge behind point
stays back and woks the ball towards long on. Pakistan were 60 after 10 overs, New Zealand are 22 ahead and cruising with ten wickets intact
that's too wide outside off, Guptill can't reach it despite his long reach
in the blockhole outside off, Guptill stays back and hits the ball to long off

a huge appeal for caught behind! Pakistan think they have Williamson caught down the leg side but the umpire signals legbye. Williamson tried to glance the short of a length ball off his hips and that came off his thigh pad. Sarfraz flew to his left to catch that with one hand, superb take. Guptill was alert to call for the run while Pakistan were appealing.
inside edged to the keeper's left for a single this time
short ball, Williamson moves towards the off side, staying deep in his crease, and is so well balanced as he pulls that to the deep backward square leg boundary
short ball again, this time Williamson backs away towards leg and tries to upper cut, this time he misses
moves across in his crease to flick the ball hard but gets an inside edge on to his pad, the ball goes towards short third man

good length outside off, Williamson nudges it close on the leg side, Guptill runs, Williamson sends him back, Sarfraz gets to the ball quickly but Guptill makes it back in time, Afridi had also broken the stumps with his body as he moved to get behind the stumps
played to mid on for a single
"only one," screams Afridi as the slog sweep goes towards long leg
steps out and punches the ball into the covers
goes back and pulls the ball off his pads through square leg
short and wide outside off, too much width, Williamson frees his arms and cuts the ball hard over backward point for four to bring up the 100 stand

it's going poorly for Amir tonight, Williamson moves towards the off side in his crease to counter the angle across him from over the wicket and whips the ball off his pads to bring up a fifty, second of the series and far more fluent than the one in Auckland
backs away towards leg this time and drives the ball hard to  long off
length ball just outside off, Guptill stays in his crease and drags the ball across his front pad, smacking it to the square leg boundary
shot! A low full toss outside off, Guptill gets down low, reaches for it wide outside off stump, and lofts over cover for four
short of a length angling across Guptill who slogs across the line and misses

heaves across the line again, this time the timing is not good so the ball won't make it to the short boundary at deep midwicket. 15 runs off the over, Amir will find that international batting has changed a fair bit in the last five years
played back to the bowler
pushed through midwicket for a single
steps out to a short ball and just blasts it through cover, so much power
worked off the back foot to long on
steps out but is not to the pitch of the ball, drives on the up through the line to long off
steps out and sort of yorks himself, dug out to long on for a single

and Guptill sends him high and far back over his head! The ball was flighted and straight, Guptill moves outside leg to free his arms and swung with might, that was a massive blow, the ball went miles in the air and deep in the stands
dragged short this time so Guptill waits and mows the ball far over deep square leg, watch out in the grass banks!
flatter and shorter outside off, Guptill hangs back and slaps the ball through cover point
width outside off stump, delicate from Williamson to complement Guptill's power, he goes back and cuts late, beating backward point to his left
worked off the pads towards square leg
tries to cut a wide ball outside off but misses
Malik from around the wicket, bowled flat and straight, Williamson stays in his crease and dabs behind point
whoops! Dropped. Williamson steps out and chips the ball tamely towards Malik's right at knee height, should have really caught that
shot! steps out of his crease and flicks the ball off his pads to the deep midwicket boundary
goes back and towards leg to punch the ball to long on for a single
tries to sweep but makes poor contact
this time he connects with the sweep, hitting it behind square leg
Williamson moves towards the off side to meet a fuller ball and drives the ball so smoothly to the wide long off boundary, I can watch him back all day and night
stays back this time to a short of a length ball outside off and cuts behind point
banged in short, Guptill shapes to pull but then ducks under it
short ball, it's the short boundary on the leg side and Guptill nails the pull, hitting it flat and far onto the grass banks
sprays the ball so wide outside off, to where first slip would have been really, Sarfraz had no chance
slower ball outside off, Guptill tries to steer to third man but misses
short of a length and wide outside off, Guptill mis-hits the flat-batted slap in the air towards long off, Amir doesn't come in quickly enough to catch it
steps out and punches the ball towards midwicket
backs away towards leg and hits the ball hard towards wide long on, the fielder runs to his right to field
bowled wide outside leg, Williamson reaches for it and sweeps, hits it straight to short fine leg through

tries to sweep and gets a bottom edge that takes the ball to the fine leg boundary! NZ have won by ten wickets and these two have broken the world record for the highest partnership in T20 internationals for any wicket
